Class BaseMenu

  • Object
    • BaseMenu
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CheckoutMenuUI, FoodMenuUI, MainMenuUI, OrderMenuUI, PromotionMenuUI, ReservationMenuUI, SalesRevenueReportMenuUI, StaffMgmtMenuUI

    public abstract class BaseMenu
extends Object
    Abstract class where all menu UIs inherits from

    • Method Detail

      • generateMenuScreen

        protected abstract int generateMenuScreen()
        An abstract class that the other classes that inherits this class needs to override and implement
        Returns:
        Exit Codes for startMainMenu() to implement. 0 to loop into the method again, negative to return false and positive to return true

      • startMainMenu

        public boolean startMainMenu()
        Other classes calls this method to start the MAIN Menu on a loop
        Returns:
        Exit Code, true to exit the program

      • printHeader

        protected static void printHeader(String headerName)
        Helper method to print the header of a menu
        Parameters:
        headerName - Name of the menu

      • printHeader

        protected static void printHeader(String headerName,
                                  int length)
        Helper method to print the header of a menu
        Parameters:
        headerName - Name of the menu
        length - Length of the header

      • printBreaks

        protected static void printBreaks(int length)
        Helper method to create a menu separator (e.g -----------)
        Parameters:
        length - How many dashes to append

      • printBreaks

        protected static void printBreaks()
        Helper method to create a menu separator (e.g -----------)

      • doMenuChoice

        protected static int doMenuChoice(int max,
                                  int specialEscape)
        Helper method to select a menu option with the appropriate exception handling. If the user exceeds the max option defined or enters a non numeric character an appropriate error message will occur
        Parameters:
        max - The max option a user can select
        specialEscape - A special option that will be used for special operations like exiting the program
        Returns:
        The menu option selected by the user
